<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Commercial Success: Reaching to the Planets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommerzieller Erfolg: Erreichen zu den 
Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Succès Commercial : Atteinte aux planètes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sucesso Comercial: Alcançar aos planetas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Successo Commerciale: Raggiungendo ai 
pianeti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμπορική επιτυχία: Επίτευξη στους πλανήτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éxito Comercial: El alcanzar a los 
planetas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will view examples of travel commercials and create their own focusing on one of the eight planets in our Solar System.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer sehen Beispiele der 
Spielraumwerbungen an und erstellen ihr eigenes Konzentrieren auf 
einen der acht Planeten in unserem Solarsystem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants visualiseront des exemples des 
films publicitaires de voyage et créeront leur propre se concentrer 
sur une des huit planètes dans notre système solaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes verão exemplos de comerciais do 
curso e criarão seu próprio focalizar em um dos oito planetas em 
nosso sistema solar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi osserveranno gli esempi degli annunci 
pubblicitari di corsa e creeranno la loro propria focalizzazione su 
uno degli otto pianeti nel nostro sistema solare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εμφανίσουν τα παραδείγματα των 
αντιπροσώπων ταξιδιού και θα δημιουργήσουν την εστίασή τους σε 
έναν από τους οκτώ πλανήτες στο ηλιακό σύστημά μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes opinión ejemplos de los anuncios 
del recorrido y crearán su propio centrarse en uno de los ocho 
planetas en nuestra Sistema Solar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205307</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

            <value>yes</value>

    </metadata>
  </description>
